originalText.text: I was injured in the gym a few weeks ago. My pains were severe, but I thought they would soon disappear on their own. Instead, they continued. A friend recommended the clinic to me. Following my doctor's examination, doc told me that I have bulging disc disease and I should seek treatment right away. Following three treatments, I recovered. My injury is serious, and I must see a bulging disc doctor until the bitter end! Thanks to Dr. Hosn as well!

originalText.text: Due to work-related back pain, I need bulging disc therapy. Dr. Vivek Mehta is the finest in his field. Don't put off seeing him if your back hurts. The pain won't go away by itself.

originalText.text: After moving to another apartment, I injured my back. The pain was so bad that I couldn't move. A friend suggested I see Dr. Amr Hosn. Upon diagnosing bulging disc disease, urgent treatment was prescribed. It reduced my pain considerably withing one week! Thanks, you're the best in NY!

originalText.text: I love my bulging disc doctor! He has been a great support since I suffer with disc herniation. I am very impressed with his level of understanding. I recommend NY Pain Care clinic to anyone who needs bulging disc pain treatment.

originalText.text: If you would like a sciatica nerve pain treatment, attend this office in NYC. These are the sole pros I trust, and I am sure if you attend them you will forthwith trust them too!
